name: Outlook Preferences File
summary: Learn about .OLK14PREF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OLK14PREF files are saved within the following directory in Mac OS X: [user]/​Documents/​Microsoft User Data/​Office 2011 Identities/​Main Identity/​Data Records/​Preferences/​

description: File created by Outlook for Mac, an email program first released in the 2011 Office suite for Mac; contains software preferences, which can specify composition and reading settings; saved and read automatically by the software.
